zuno.configuration.title: Z-Uno: Configuration
zuno.configuration.path.description: Path for installing Z-Uno components. Example: «C:\<user>\Documents\Z-Uno» for Windows, «/Users/<user>/Documents» for Mac, «/home/$user/Documents/Z-Uno» for Linux. Requires restart of VS Code after the change, as well as access to the specified folder without administrator rights.
zuno.configuration.outputTerminal.descri: If enabled, the information is output to the terminal, instead of the output data.
zuno.configuration.autoUpdateTime.descri: How often to check for new versions. For example: 86400 - one day.
zuno.configuration.baudRate.description: Default baudrate for the serial port monitor. The default value is 115200. Supported values are 115200, 57600, 38400, 19200, 9600, 4800, 2400, 1800, 1200, 600, 300, 200, 150, 134, 110, 75 and 50
zuno.configuration.keyBindings.descripti: If enabled, it offers to reassign the keys at startup
